game_description: Experience a VR house party simulation developed by the Blurred Minds team from Social Marketing @ Griffith, Griffith University. The VR House Party is a gamified drama that unfolds at a teen house party with a range of storylines determined by students as they watch and drink â€¦ or don't drink. The VR House Party is an immersive 'choose your own live-action adventure' where users become the directors. Blurred Minds has been built following a decade of research and development. All Blurred Minds resources have been co-created with students, Health and Physical Education teachers and alcohol and drug experts and built with the support of game developers and curriculum consultants. Extensive formative research and ongoing development have allowed us to create a cutting-edge alcohol and drug education resources that are evidence-based and effective.
